title: Hardmode Anvils
summaries: The Mythril Anvil and Orichalcum Anvil are Hardmode crafting stations that serve and extend the function of a Pre-Hardmode Anvil. These are very crucial to game advancement, as they account for making nearly every Hardmode recipe before the Ancient Manipulator. In addition to acting as a direct replacement to Lead and Iron Anvils and inheriting all of their crafting recipes, they further serve the similar function of crafting bars forged of Hardmode ores into weapons, armor and tools, as well as several other items like Wings.

statistics.Tooltip: Used to craft items from mythril, orichalcum, adamantite, and titanium bars
statistics.Sell: 50
